title: OpeKan
description:
Inside the Surgery Room it is always very dramatic!
Hayashi Akiko, 22 year old single! Searching for highly praised in dramas cool surgeon boyfriend became a nurse♡
To become a popular woman, she applied for a job as an Surgeon Nurse (shortly OpeKan)!
But in reality working in a hospital is way different that in dramas!  It's very rigorous and cruel place...
The bittersweet struggles of a clumsy nurse in the surgery room!
